title: Nunu needs a new skin
body: In my opinion its overdue for nunu to get a new (good) skin not such a ugly TPA-Nunu or w/e skin. It's more necessary than other champs which got way more skins that time. E.g. Annie got like 3 skins new meanwhile or Varus ( well he hadn't many) but he got 3 skins while nun got the lame TPA one ._.   . Even Soraka got 3 new skins in a row incoming ._, (although that was necessary too) He's such a great champ and i guess he should get one new :P there are so many possibilities for a new one. I (and maybe many others) would be looking forward to a new one ;3

replies.body: yea yorick too :P would really be looking forward that skin http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=769430&d=1377809271
